TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit LayoutEngine extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用來實作配置引擎的基底型別 (Base Class)。

span.span: Provides the base class for implementing layout engines.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別時，您想要在執行階段建立的自訂版面配置行為。Use the class when you want to create custom layout behavior at run time. 衍生您自己從類別並覆寫方法，以定義您的自訂版面配置的行為。Derive your own class from the class and override the method to define your custom layout behavior. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別來實作自訂版面配置行為。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class to implement custom layout behavior. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine/cpp/DemoFlowLayout.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine/CS/DemoFlowLayout.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine/VB/DemoFlowLayout.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

para.span: 配置行為應該版面配置引擎的相關聯的容器類別之執行個體相同。

span.span: Layout behavior should be the same for any instance of your layout engine's associated container class.

para.span: 基於這個理由，請考慮版面配置引擎的建構函式宣告或，並實作您的版面配置引擎，為單一類別。

span.span: For this reason, consider declaring your layout engine's constructor or , and implementing your layout engine as a singleton class.

param.name: child
param.span: 配置引擎將在其中作業的容器。

span.span: The container on which the layout engine will operate.

param.name: specified

span.span: The bounds defining the container's size and position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 選擇性地提供中的初始化邏輯方法。Optionally provide initialization logic in the method.

exception.span: 不是 可以在上面執行配置的型別。

span.span: is not a type on which can perform layout.

para.span: 覆寫方法以提供您的自訂初始化的行為。

span.span: Override the method to provide your custom initialization behavior.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool Layout (object container, System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs layoutEventArgs);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Layout(object container, class System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs layoutEventArgs) cil managed
public: virtual bool Layout(System::Object ^ container, System::Windows::Forms::LayoutEventArgs ^ layoutEventArgs);

param.name: container
param.span: 配置引擎將在其中作業的容器。

span.span: The container on which the layout engine will operate.
An event argument from a event.

summary.span: 要求配置引擎執行一個配置作業。

span.span: Requests that the layout engine perform a layout operation.

returns.span: 如果 的父代 (Parent) 應該再次執行配置，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if layout should be performed again by the parent of ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 版面配置引擎上執行版面配置操作時，會呼叫這個方法`container`參數。This method is called when the layout engine is to perform a layout operation on the `container` parameter. 您可以檢查的值， ，和屬性`layoutEventArgs`決定是否需要配置作業。You can check the value of the , , and properties on `layoutEventArgs` to decide if a layout operation is necessary. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以實作自訂版面配置行為。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to implement custom layout behavior. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine/cpp/DemoFlowLayout.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine/CS/DemoFlowLayout.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine/VB/DemoFlowLayout.vb#4)]

exception.span: 不是 可以在上面執行配置的型別。

span.span: is not a type on which can perform layout.

para.span: 覆寫方法以提供您的自訂版面配置的行為。

span.span: Override the method to provide your custom layout behavior.

para.span: 配置的內容時參數時，一定要檢查每個子控制項的屬性。

span.span: When laying out the contents of the parameter, be sure to check the property of each child control.

para.span: 傳回如果您的版面配置引擎的邏輯會決定應該再次執行該版面配置，容器的父代。

span.span: Return if your layout engine logic determines that layout should be performed again by the parent of the container.

para.span: 這可能會發生，例如版面配置引擎調整子控制項，並判斷容器，必須以容納新的版面配置的大小增加時。

span.span: This might occur, for example, when the layout engine resizes child controls and determines that the container must be increased in size to accommodate the new layout.
